trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> implementation so that you can use the "weak event listener" pattern to attach listeners for the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref>实现，以便你可以使用"弱事件侦听器"模式来附加侦听器<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: In order to be listeners in this pattern, your listener objects must implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.
trans-unit.target: 若要在此模式中的侦听器，侦听器对象必须实现<xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.</xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> on the class that is the source of the events.
trans-unit.target: 不需要实现<xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>的源的事件的类。</xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified event handler, which is called when specified source raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的事件处理程序，它在指定的源引发时调用<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 源对象引发<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 处理委托<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified listener to the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event of the specified source.
trans-unit.target: 将添加到指定的侦听器<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>的指定的源的事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: 与事件对象。

trans-unit.source: The object to add as a listener.
trans-unit.target: 要作为侦听器添加的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new object to contain listeners to the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的对象，以包含侦听器<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: A new object to contain listeners to the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 要包含到侦听器的新对象<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified event handler from the specified source.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的源中删除指定的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 源对象引发<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 处理委托<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified listener from the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event of the specified source.
trans-unit.target: 删除从指定的侦听器<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>的指定的源的事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: 与事件对象。

trans-unit.source: The listener to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Begins listening for the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event on the specified source.
trans-unit.target: 开始侦听<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>上指定的源的事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: 与事件对象。

trans-unit.source: Stops listening for the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event on the specified source.
trans-unit.target: 停止侦听<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>上指定的源的事件。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: 与事件对象。
